Comments: Battalion in the Trenches (70 m from enemy)

Location: Front Line Right Sector of Hooge Trench

Comments: Relieved by 43rd Battalion. Replace 60 Battalion as Reserve
Relieved by 1st Royal Warwichshire, Poperinghe by train
March, truck to Station for train to Somme
Train 36 men to the box car
Ready to enter Battle of Courcelette
Front Line Ready to Engage at zollern Redoubt
Repositioned. Heavt shelling.  Bill Johnston Wounded.
Grenade Attacks on German Trenches. Very Heavy fighting
Relieved by 52nd Battalion.  8 mile march to Albert.
Replaced by 15 Battalion. Return to rest area.
Assault on Regina Trench. 58th made it to the trench, but was forced back
Replaced by 5th CMR.  30 Kiled, 111 Missing, 141 Wounded.
Route March 10 miles then 3 days training.
